li.label: violated
li.description: I was stripped and restrained for an unknown length of time. This time, it wasn’t by choice.

li.label: humiliated
li.description: They stripped me, restrained me, and paraded me for the colony’s amusement. Once a twisted fantasy—now a waking nightmare.

li.label: chemically burned
li.description: They forced me naked into a vat of chemfuel, pouring more as I begged them to stop. My skin peeled away, my fingers fell off, and now there's nothing left to be embarrassed about—only agony.

li.label: sensory overload
li.description: They trapped me naked in a machine—a relentless barrage of flashing lights, tortured screams, propaganda, and the unbearable stench of rot. Reality dissolved into horror.
